title: Genesys Workshop
content:
Genesys Workshop Welcome In this workshop you will learn to apply your foundational knowledge of Genesys and master example use cases that demonstrate Experience as a Service.
Learning Objectives  Setup and configure your environment. Creating users and groups. Configure security.
